COUNCIL:
What is your vision for the municipality of the above Council? (maximum 50 words)
My vision for the City of Casey is to create a vibrant, inclusive, and sustainable community
where everyone feels valued and has the opportunity to thrive. I envision a municipality that
not only supports its residents through accessible services and infrastructure but also actively
engages them in the decision-making process.

What expertise or attributes do you have which would help you in undertaking the role of Councillor?
Provide details (maximum 50 words)
With a background in Case management and ongoing study in Politics, Philosophy and
Economics, I have completed various community leadership programs including Casey
Community Leadership Program which gives me better understanding of the unique needs of
our diverse community. I advocated for the student in Victoria Youth Parliament.

Are you endorsed by a registered political party?
Note: Registered political party has the same meaning as in Part 4 of the Electoral Act 2002.

current term of office?
